title: Bonjour Balwyn
creator_credit: Nigel Buesst and Experimental Film Fund, Australia Council for the Arts
brief_description: A feature film about a young man’s futile attempt to publish a trendy magazine in Carlton. When his efforts begin to fail, he must turn to petty crime to help make ends meet. Stars John Duigan and Peter Cummins.
creator_credit_for_label: Nigel Buesst and Experimental Film Fund, Australia Council for the Arts
